value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...do not know what to say.
I am at a loss for words.$k$pYet I can offer you my sympathies
as someone who has recently lost
one I held dear.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It is regrettable, but we do not have
the time to grieve. I sense Embla
drawing nearer to us.$k$pThere is a good chance she will take
control of Princess Veronica and use
her against us, to try to kill us.$k$p...How would you like to approach
this situation? We must act soon.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy is upon us! Get ready
to mount a counteroffensive!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|E-excuse me... Prince Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse! We need you! Please!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|Sharena... I can't...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Don't give up, Alfonse!$k$pIt wasn't your fault! None of it!
This was Embla's doing, and hers
alone! All right?$k$pAnd now...Zacharias is gone...
and this time he won't be coming
back to us. But even still...$k$pWe can't give up now! We have
to see this through to the very end.
If anyone can win, it's you, Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...That was our only plan, Sharena.
And it failed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If our only plan failed...we just have
to come up with a new one! That's
what we do!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|We're out of time.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Don't give up!$k$pRemember what Zacharias asked
of you!$k$pHe wanted you to take care
of Princess Veronica!$k$pHe entrusted her fate to you!
It was his last wish!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Please, Alfonse... *sniff*$k$p*sniff* Please...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pYou're right, Sharena. Now is no
time to grieve.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Yes! That's right, Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I have to think.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I must put Zacharias out of my mind...$k$p$EFace_Anger|I have to put my thoughts elsewhere,
and this will be no easy task.$k$pWe have to save Veronica and
defeat Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Oh, Alfonse! Do you have an
idea already?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Nothing yet, but...$k$p$EFace_Anger|There's something that has been
bothering me.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|I don't understand...$k$pWhy didn't the Yggdrasill Key
pass to Embla?$k$pShe noticed something... Then she
released him. That was the moment
our plan unraveled.$k$pThe power of the key should have
been able to save Zacharias, but...$k$pThe key's power was blocked,
and then Zacharias was killed...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Is Embla so strong that she's able
to overpower even the Yggdrasill Key?$k$pAnd if she is, how can we ever hope
to defeat her?$k$p$Sbs150|
